Posts.Content: Oct 12, 2009 02:59PM SuThorn wrote: Hi-  I have been away from the boards for awhile and have not posted a great deal in the past, but your question caught my eye.  I was diagnosed with Stage IV two years ago and after a year was NED.  At that time, I had a bilateral mastectomy and have also had reconstruction!  My onc and surgeon were both completely supportive that it was my decision on whether or not to have one and if so to have a bilateral.  My insurance also covered both procedures.  If you have any questions, you are more than welcome to PM me.
Posts.Title: Want to hear from Stg IV BC re: Plan of Care activern activern

Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2009 01:32AM SuThorn wrote: Hi Abby-  I am sorry that you are having such a rough time with taxol and carbo.  I received TCH for 10 months last year and it is a rough treatment, but I have been NED ever since.  I am not sure what your dosing schedule is, but I received it weekly and found that it was much easier to manage that way.  Suzanne
Posts.Title: tax and carbo kicked my but! abbyglp faithmena4
